column2: who granted him the hills of [[Emyn Arnen]] for his residence as [[Prince of Ithilien]].

column1: Emyn Arnen were [[Gondor]]'s lands east of the [[Anduin|Great River]] and the homeland of [[Stewards of Gondor|Steward]] [[Húrin of Emyn Arnen]]
column2: the patriarch of the [[House of Húrin|House of the Stewards]] and ancestor of Faramir.
